mapper.insert: insert into tbl_commute( com_no, com_d8, com_start, com_end, com_total, prj_in_no)SELECT NULL,#{com_d8},sysdate,NULL,NULL,a.PRJ_IN_NO FROM TBL_PROJECT_IN a WHERE email=#{email} AND prj_no=#{prj_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_commute SET com_end = sysdate, COM_TOTAL = trunc(((SYSDATE - COM_START) * 60 * 24)) WHERE com_d8 = #{com_d8} AND PRJ_IN_NO = (SELECT PRJ_IN_NO FROM TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PRJ_NO = ${prj_no})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(TC.COM_TOTAL,'0') COM_TOTAL, TC.COM_D8, DA.DAY from (SELECT to_char(day + LEVEL - 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as DAY FROM (SELECT trunc(TO_DATE(#{com_d8},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'DAY') as DAY FROM dual) CONNECT BY LEVEL<= 7) DA, (SELECT COM_D8, COM_TOTAL FROM tbl_commute WHERE prj_in_no = (SELECT PRJ_IN_NO FROM TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PRJ_NO = #{prj_no})) TC WHERE DA.DAY = TC.COM_D8(+) ORDER BY DA.DAY
SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi WHERE prj_no = #{prj_no}

SELECT tc.*,tpi.email,tm.name FROM TBL_COMMUTE tc JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tc.PRJ_IN_NO = tpi.PRJ_IN_NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tpi.email = tm.email where com_d8 = #{com_d8}AND tpi.prj_no= #{prj_no} order by tc.com_start
SELECT count(tc.com_start) FROM TBL_COMMUTE tc JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tc.PRJ_IN_NO = tpi.PRJ_IN_NO WHERE tc.com_d8 = #{com_d8} AND tpi.PRJ_NO =#{prj_no}

SELECT L.monthC, L.monthS, tm.name, L.prj_no FROM TBL_MEMBER tm join (SELECT tpi.email email , com.pin , com.monthC monthC, com.monthS monthS, tpi.PRJ_NO prj_no FROM TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi join (SELECT count(TC.COM_d8) monthC ,sum(TC.COM_total) monthS ,tc.prj_in_no pin FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR (FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') day FROM (SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{com_d8}), 'MM') FIRST_DAY FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1 <= TRUNC(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{com_d8})))) DA , (SELECT COM_D8, COM_TOTAL, PRJ_IN_NO FROM tbl_commute) TC WHERE DA.DAY = TC.COM_D8(+) group BY tc.prj_in_no) com ON tpi.PRJ_IN_NO = com.pin) L ON L.email = tm.email WHERE L.prj_no=#{prj_no} ORDER BY monthC desc,monthS desc

SELECT tr.rpt_no FROM tbl_report tr WHERE prj_no=#{prj_no} AND RPT_WRITER = (SELECT PRJ_IN_NO FROM TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi JOIN (SELECT email FROM TBL_MEMBER)tm ON tm.EMAIL =tpi.EMAIL WHERE tm.EMAIL = #{email}AND tpi.PRJ_NO =#{prj_no}) and TO_CHAR(RPT_WRITE_D8, 'YYYY-MM-DD') =#{com_d8}

SELECT tc.*,tpi.email,tm.name,da.day FROM TBL_COMMUTE tc JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tc.PRJ_IN_NO = tpi.PRJ_IN_NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tpi.email = tm.email LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR (FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') day FROM (SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{com_d8}), 'MM') FIRST_DAY FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY FIRST_DAY + LEVEL - 1 <= TRUNC(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{com_d8})))) DA ON da.DAY = tc.COM_D8 WHERE tpi.PRJ_NO = #{prj_no} ORDER BY COM_D8, COM_START
